Help

What is the minimum amount of deposit?

The minimum deposit amount is 0.005 BTC

What is the minimum amount of payout?

The minimum payout amount is 0.005 BTC or 10.00 USD.

What payment systems do you support?

We work with Bitcoin only. You can invest BTC with conversion to USD or without it.

Why would I need to convert one currency to another?

The conversion makes the BTC/USD rate at the moment of deposit fixed for the term of deposit.

Can I create multiple accounts?

Yes, but there cannot be any referral connections among them.

Can I change the person who invited me?

Not if you have already specified someone.

Ask your question
